thread.title: Rio Tinto lowers iron ore guidance
thread.title_full: Rio Tinto lowers iron ore guidance

title: Rio Tinto lowers iron ore guidance
text:
Thu, Jul 16, 2015, 9:11 AM AEST - Australia Markets open in 49 mins. Rio Tinto lowers iron ore guidance AAP – 12 minutes ago Print 
Rio Tinto's iron ore shipments are up 12 per cent, but the miner has lowered its full year guidance slightly after bad weather hit its Pilbara operations. 
The mining giant now expects to ship around 340 million tonnes of iron ore during the 2015 calender year after unseasonal weather events, including two cyclones, in the Pilbara reduced shipments by around seven million tonnes. 
Rio shipped 81.4 million tonnes of iron ore during the June quarter, while production of the material was up seven per cent at 79.7 million tonnes. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Finance News Update, what you need to know AAP
